Package fr.n7.stl.block.ast

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Assignable  
    Block
    Represents a Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree node for the Bloc language.
    BlockFactory
    Combines the various factories for the Bloc language.
    ConstantDeclaration
    AST node for the constant declaration instruction.
    CoupleType
    Abstract Syntax Tree node specification for couple type.
    Declaration  
    Expression
    Represents an Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree node for the Bloc language.
    ExpressionFactory
    Factory to create Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for common expressions in programming languages.
    FieldDeclaration  
    FunctionCall  
    HierarchicalScope<D extends Declaration>
    Interface to mark a node in the Abstract Syntax Tree as a Hierarchical Scope in the language.
    Instruction
    Represents an Instruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree node for the Bloc language.
    InstructionFactory
    Factory to create Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for common instructions in programming languages.
    IntegerValue  
    RecordType
    Abstract Syntax Tree node specification for record type.
    Scope<D extends Declaration>
    Interface to mark a node in the Abstract Syntax Tree as a Scope in the language.
    Sequence  
    Type
    Gathers the common services provided by types.
    TypeDeclaration  
    TypeFactory
    Factory to create nodes for types.
    Value  
    VariableDeclaration  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AtomicType
    Elementary types in the Bloc language.
    BinaryOperator
    Binary operators in the Bloc language.

    UnaryOperator
